content.title: Bumi (son of Aang)
content.main_content: Bumi is the first child and eldest son of Avatar Aang and Katara. Unlike his younger siblings, Bumi was born a non-bender. Despite this, he became a commander in the United Forces, where he relied on his cunning and leadership skills. Later in life, Bumi surprisingly developed airbending abilities during Harmonic Convergence.
